net.sourceforge.pmd.lang.rule.properties

Class IntegerProperty

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sourceforge.pmd.lang.rule.properties.AbstractProperty<T>
      • net.sourceforge.pmd.lang.rule.properties.AbstractScalarProperty<T>
        • net.sourceforge.pmd.lang.rule.properties.AbstractNumericProperty<Integer>
          • net.sourceforge.pmd.lang.rule.properties.IntegerProperty
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<PropertyDescriptor<?>>, NumericPropertyDescriptor<Integer>, PropertyDescriptor<Integer>

    public class IntegerProperty
extends AbstractNumericProperty<Integer>
    Defines a datatype that supports single Integer property values within an upper and lower boundary.
    Author:
    Brian Remedios
